Karl Jenkins - Performances

Looking forward to the Manchester concert in May.

item.title: Sunset Boulevard
item.description:
Sunset Boulevard

Andrew Lloyd Webber's hit musical Sunset Boulevard comes to the London Coliseum, with Glenn Close reprising her Tony Award-winning role as Norma Desmond. Sunset Boulevard is a compelling story of romance and obsession, based on Billy Wilder's classic film, with celebrated book and lyrics by Don Black and Christopher Hampton.

item.title: Batman v Superman takes $424m at global box office - BBC News
item.description:
Batman v Superman takes $424m at global box office - BBC News

Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice has taken $424m (Â£300m) at the box office worldwide in its first five days despite poor reviews. The global total - the fourth-highest ever - included $170.1m in the United States, a record for a March debut and the sixth-highest US opening weekend.
